video_info.title: The Emirates FA Cup 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: Old Trafford sets the stage for one of the standout ties of the FA Cup third round. Manchester United will be eager to respond after an inconsistent spell, with home advantage offering a boost. Brighton, however, arrive with confidence and a reputation for fluid attacking football, making this a contest that could go either way. Who will come out on top? Find out as we bring you all the action from The Emirates FA Cup 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.

video_info.title: The Emirates FA Cup 2025-26
video_info.shortDescription: Fratton Park hosts an intriguing FA Cup third-round tie as Portsmouth look to defy the odds against Premier League giants Arsenal. The visitors are expected to rotate their squad but still bring plenty of quality, while Portsmouth will rely on home support and resilience to make this a competitive contest. Who will come out on top? Find out as we bring you all the action from The Emirates FA Cup 2025-26, LIVE on Sony LIV.

video_info.title: Indian Idol
video_info.shortDescription: Indian Idol 16 – “Yaadon Ki Playlist” celebrates music that brings back cherished memories and emotions. For the first time ever, auditions go outdoors, traveling across India to discover raw talent, hosted by the legendary Udit Narayan, while Aditya Narayan returns as the main host. The judges - Vishal Dadlani, Shreya Ghoshal, and Badshah - search for voices that touch hearts. A season where every song is a memory, and every melody tells a story.

video_info.title: Pakistan Tour of Sri Lanka 2026
video_info.shortDescription: Sri Lanka take on Pakistan in the 3rd T20I at Rangiri Dambulla International Stadium. With the second match abandoned, the hosts aim to level the series while Pakistan look to seal it. Can home advantage swing it Sri Lanka’s way or will Pakistan finish the job? Tune in to find out as we bring you all the action from Pakistan Tour of Sri Lanka 2026, LIVE on Sony LIV.
